name: First Class on an Ultra Luxury Cruise | Scarlet Lady
description:
Check out the Vessi stormburst and other styles at https://vessi.com/TrekTrendy , Get your Vessi sneaker and size you want
now and use code TREKTRENDY for 15% off your entire order! Free shipping to CA, US, AU,JP, TW, KR, SGP, “Online Store”

Today I’m taking one of the worlds most luxurious First Class cruises, for 5 days to the Caribbean. Join me in the very best suite onboard, dubbed the Mega Rockstar Massive Suite. 

As always I’ll give you a comprehensive review of the experience, from the food on offer, the onboard facilities such as the luxurious spa, the pools & our private hot tub. My aim is to see if this really is the luxury cruise line which it’s been touted as, and if this is a true luxurious experience. I’d also like to benchmark this against other experiences, such as the Orient Express, Rovos Rail or even Queen Mary 2 trips which I’ve taken over the last few months. 

I already expect this to be a more informal approach to luxury, but will the best suite onboard live up to expectations. Oh and talking of our suite, this features, a bedroom, living room, Italian marble bathroom, music studio and the largest balcony / terrace you’ve seen at sea. This really is like a floating 5* hotel.  

0:00 - Intro
1:26 - Our Suite
